sentence: Our room with balcony had a lovely view of the golf course
We had a great room in the Hibiscus building overlooking the golf course a huge room and big modern bathroom with all the amenities and of course a very comfortable king size bed
Played a lot of golf

the beds themselves were so comfortable staff much friendlier and helpful restaurants Corsair and Bourbon were great both golf courses were in peak condition prices for food and drinks not exorbitant and overall just so much better than before
I selected this spot because I wanted to play a lot of golf without having to venture far from my room and also because of the Michael Mina and Scott Conant restaurants on site
The Golf Courses were in excellent shape and a real treat and what you would expect for an accommodation like this
My group played golf last week at the resort and it was incredible
Our view from the balcony of the golf course was very pleasant
Gorgeous club awesome golf course
Excellent golf course with incredible service
I am not a golfer but looks great for those who are

My husband commented that the golf service was not up to the customer service standards as he has come to expect in the US as he was left to find his own way to the courses taking his own clubs with him
It took a day for me to accept what it is and we started to like the pool the dining places and the golf setting even I did n’t play
Horrendous golf experience
some spa services are included although I did n’t get a chance to use them
There was a View of the golf course and ocean from our balcony
If I could give this place zero star I would the Spa department is extremely rude Shannon was very rude
The water activity area closed early
Golf courses were super but very pricey
Also keep in mind the resort has paying members who use the water park and the golf course
However there were a series of three steps most everywhere and those with walking difficulties struggled when those obstacles arose
